title: RBI Monetary Policy 2025 Highlights: MPC delivers dovish pause; ups FY26 GDP growth forecast; unveils measures for banks
description: RBI Monetary Policy 2025 Highlights: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has announced its monetary policy decision today, Wednesday, 1 October 2025. The fourth bi-monthly meeting of the Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) for FY26, chaired by RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra, was held from September 29 to Octo...
